trans-unit.source: List Deployment Events
trans-unit.target: List Deployment Events

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>List Deployment Events</languageKeyword> operation lists the events that impacted a deployment in the specified timeframe.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>List Deployment Events</languageKeyword> operation lists the events that impacted a deployment in the specified timeframe.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>List Deployment Events</languageKeyword> request can be used to retrieve deployment events for a single deployment slot (staging or production) or for a specific deployment name.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>List Deployment Events</languageKeyword> request can be used to retrieve deployment events for a single deployment slot (staging or production) or for a specific deployment name.

trans-unit.source: If you want to retrieve information by deployment name, you must first get the unique name for the deployment.
trans-unit.target: If you want to retrieve information by deployment name, you must first get the unique name for the deployment.

trans-unit.source: This unique name is part of the response when you make a request to <link xlink:href="21449db8-7f94-4726-95a7-a4e3b0039ac3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Deployment</link> for a deployment slot.
trans-unit.target: This unique name is part of the response when you make a request to <link xlink:href="21449db8-7f94-4726-95a7-a4e3b0039ac3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Deployment</link> for a deployment slot.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a cloud service deployed to the production environment, you can get the unique name by making a request to <link xlink:href="21449db8-7f94-4726-95a7-a4e3b0039ac3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Deployment</link> for the production slot.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you have a cloud service deployed to the production environment, you can get the unique name by making a request to <link xlink:href="21449db8-7f94-4726-95a7-a4e3b0039ac3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Deployment</link> for the production slot.

trans-unit.source: The response includes a <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element for the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: The response includes a <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element for the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: That <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element value can be used to make a request to <codeInline>…/deployments/%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;/events</codeInline> if you want to retrieve information about that specific deployment.
trans-unit.target: That <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element value can be used to make a request to <codeInline>…/deployments/%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;/events</codeInline> if you want to retrieve information about that specific deployment.

trans-unit.source: To generate the request URI, replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, or <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment.
trans-unit.target: To generate the request URI, replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, or <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment.

trans-unit.source: The subscription ID for the Azure user.
trans-unit.target: The subscription ID for the Azure user.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The name of the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: The name of the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Required if not using <codeInline>deployment-name</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Required if not using <codeInline>deployment-name</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The deployment slot, which can be <codeInline>staging</codeInline> or <codeInline>production</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The deployment slot, which can be <codeInline>staging</codeInline> or <codeInline>production</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Required if not using <codeInline>deployment-slot</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Required if not using <codeInline>deployment-slot</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the deployment.
trans-unit.target: The name of the deployment.

trans-unit.source: Required.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Specifies a value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a continuation token that enables you to get the remainder of the response when there are more cloud services to list than can be returned in the allotted time.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a continuation token that enables you to get the remainder of the response when there are more cloud services to list than can be returned in the allotted time.

trans-unit.source: If a large number of cloud services exist in the subscription, not all of them can be listed in a single response.
trans-unit.target: If a large number of cloud services exist in the subscription, not all of them can be listed in a single response.

trans-unit.source: You can use the token in this header in subsequent operation requests until all cloud services are returned.
trans-unit.target: You can use the token in this header in subsequent operation requests until all cloud services are returned.

trans-unit.source: Role name of the Role Instance that was rebooted.
trans-unit.target: Role name of the Role Instance that was rebooted.

trans-unit.target: Name of the Role Instance that was rebooted.

trans-unit.source: Hardcoded to "PlannedMaintenance" in version "2014-06-01".
trans-unit.target: Hardcoded to "PlannedMaintenance" in version "2014-06-01".

trans-unit.source: Datetime in UTC representing the time that the Reboot event started, rounded to nearest minute.
trans-unit.target: Datetime in UTC representing the time that the Reboot event started, rounded to nearest minute.
